summary: Frontend-only testing completed for WooASM.ai React application. All pages load correctly without JavaScript errors. Forms are functional and navigation works properly.

backend_issues.note: Backend is external at api.wooasm.com - not tested in this preview environment

tests_executed.details: WooASM branding visible, no console errors

tests_executed.test: Login page loads and form works
tests_executed.details: Email/password inputs visible, form fillable, forgot password and signup links present

tests_executed.test: Signup page loads and form works
tests_executed.details: Name/email/password/company inputs visible, terms checkbox present, form fillable
Admin Portal text visible, form elements present, protected access notice shown

tests_executed.test: Dashboard redirects to login when not authenticated
tests_executed.details: Protected route correctly redirects unauthenticated users to /login
Pricing, Docs, Blog, Login, Signup pages all accessible via navigation
No console errors, pricing plans displayed correctly
No console errors, knowledge base content displayed
No console errors, blog posts displayed
38 API methods exported correctly including auth, dashboard, billing, admin endpoints

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies in 5 files - minor issue, not blocking
All API field names use camelCase as required by NestJS backend specification
API service properly handles token refresh and error responses
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is a frontend-only project. Backend is hosted externally at api.wooasm.com. All pages load correctly. Dashboard routes are protected and redirect to login. API service exports 38 methods with proper camelCase field names.
